item.title: Dispatch Nintendo Switch and Switch 2 Release Date Revealed Through eShop Listing
item.content:encoded:
Dispatch is coming to Nintendo Switch and Switch 2 on January 29, 2026, according to an Australian eShop listing.

The new episodic adventure from AdHoc Studios, Dispatch, quickly found popularity among gamers, reaching 2 million copies sold in less than a month. The title was also called the Game of the Year by The Witcher 3’s director. Now, the developers are expanding the title’s reach, bringing it to more platforms.

Dispatch Arriving for Switch and Switch 2 in January 2026

Although we are yet to receive an official announcement for Dispatch’s release on the Switch and Switch 2, we already know the launch date. Spotted by Vooks, the Australian Nintendo eShop has been updated with a new listing for Dispatch with the January 2026 release date. Players who purchase the Nintendo Switch edition can get the upgrade pack for free, which includes enhanced resolution and improved frame rates.

For those unaware, Dispatch is a superhero workplace comedy by the writers and directors of Tales from the Borderlands and The Wolf Among Us. You play as Robert Robertson, also known as Mecha Man, who, after a defeat against his nemesis, has been reduced to a dispatcher. Your job is to review ongoing emergencies and deploy the right heroes to deal with them. Every decision the player makes influences the narrative, so make your choices wisely. It also features a star-studded cast, including names like Aaron Paul, MoistCr1TiKaL, Jacksepticeye, Alanah Pearce, and more.

In other news, check out Insider Gaming’s interview with the Dispatch developers. Additionally, here’s a review of the first two episodes. What are your thoughts on Dispatch releasing for Switch and Switch 2? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about more Pokémon TCG Ascended Heroes secret rares being revealed in Japan. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Dig To Escape Kitchen Ending Guide
item.content:encoded:
This Roblox Dig To Escape Kitchen Ending guide will help you earn 300 Toilet Paper fast, allowing you to blitz through the objectives and escape via the kitchen. 

The pre-Christmas Roblox Dig to Escape update featured the debut of the third ending. Dubbed as the Dig To Escape Kitchen Ending, players must purchase the Illegal Keycard and head into the kitchen to access this new escape route. This ending is seen as an easier option compared to the Janitor’s Ending since all you need to do is spend 300 Toilet Paper to reach the kitchen vent. That said, the final part of this ending will remind you of Subway Surfers and the iconic rooftop chase from the “The Chase” mission in GTA Vice City. This guide will help you earn those 300 Toilet Paper faster, walk you through the objectives, and complete the Dig To Escape Kitchen Ending.

How To Get Kitchen Ending In Dig To Escape 

What You Need To Know Before Going For The Dig To Escape Kitchen Ending:

  • Your first goal towards the Dig To Escape Kitchen Ending is to earn 300 Toilet Paper.
  • You’ll need 200 Toilet Paper for the Illegal Keycard and 100 Toilet Paper for the Crowbar.
  • Once you spawn in your cell, roll up the carpet and start digging in a rectangular pattern.
  • Digging straight down limits the number of items you find. Clearing the ground in a rectangular shape helps you uncover more items in less time.
  • Since you need 300 Toilet Paper, consider buying the Toy Shovel. It increases your digging speed, allowing you to collect more items and clear more ground quickly.
  • Trade only for Food and the Shovel. Avoid spending Toilet Paper on Energy Surge or Storage.
  • It usually takes 9–10 in-game days to save 300 Toilet Paper. On Hard difficulty, it may take longer.
  • The kitchen door is located on the left side of the Chef. Use the Keycard to scan and open it.
  • Once you’ve saved 200 Toilet Paper, buy the Illegal Keycard and head straight to the kitchen.

What To Do After Buying The Illegal Keycard For The Dig To Escape Kitchen Ending

  1. Scan the door and enter the kitchen area. There’s plenty of Food all over the place, collect them, and head back to your cell. 
  2. Continue digging for items and leave your cell only to sell them.
  3. The free Food should keep you going without needing to trade for more.
  4. After earning 100 Toilet Paper, return to the kitchen and open the freezer room.
  5. Inside, you’ll find the Frozen Chef. Interact with him to buy the Crowbar for 100 Toilet Paper.
  6. Walk up to the vent, equip the Crowbar, and use the interact button to remove the plants.
  7. Move through the vent to reach the Janitor’s office in a new building.
  8. Climb the five sets of ramps to reach the rooftop, then open the door to begin the final phase of the Kitchen Ending.

What Happens At The End Of The Dig To Escape Kitchen Ending? 

Once the rooftop door opens, a short cinematic plays. When it ends, the chase begins. Follow these steps to escape safely:

  1. Your avatar must outrun the prison guard to avoid getting caught. You’ll have a flashlight and a dark path ahead, with the guard chasing.
  2. Keep running forward and get over obstacles like building gaps, planks, and slow-down zones.
  3. After covering some distance, climb the ladder and continue moving forward.
  4. Jump only when you reach the edge of a building. This is safer and helps you avoid falling. 
  5. Use your mouse to see the path before you. 
  6. You need to be fast and accurate at the same time, as untimely moves can end the run.
  7. If there’s a plank connecting to the next building, use it instead of making risky jumps.
  8. Once you lose the guard, walk into the white blip to unlock the Dig To Escape Kitchen Ending.

The best Classes for the Dig To Escape Kitchen Ending, are the Bargainer, Heavy Lifter, and Speedster.

Enjoying our Roblox games codes coverage? Check out the codes for popular games like Steal A Brainrot, Radiant Residents, and Fix It Up on Insider Gaming!

item.title: Emergency Hamburg Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Emergency Hamburg monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Cash, XP and much more.

Emergency Hamburg transforms players into heroes of Hamburg, Germany’s virtual streets in this immersive Roblox experience. As first responders, you’ll tackle emergencies across a sprawling cityscape that developers have expanded by over 60% since launch. Choose your path – join the police force to maintain order, become a firefighter to battle blazes, work as a paramedic saving lives, or experience city life as a civilian. Each role offers unique vehicles, equipment, and responsibilities within the game’s dynamic emergency system.

Progression in Emergency Hamburg centres around earning and spending coins, the game’s primary currency. Players accumulate coins by responding to emergencies, completing missions, and performing their professional duties. This currency lets you purchase new vehicles, equipment upgrades, and specialised tools to enhance your emergency response capabilities. While dedicated gameplay naturally earns rewards, players can use promo codes shared by developers on social media and Discord to claim free coins, exclusive vehicles, and limited-time boosters, significantly reducing the grind required to reach higher ranks and acquire better equipment.

Active Emergency Hamburg Codes

Unfortunately, at the time of writing this article, there are no active codes.

Expired Emergency Hamburg Codes

  • DISCORD150
  • 700M
  • Christmas2024
  • SecondAdvent
  • FirstAdvent
  • Halloween2024
  • RobberyWeek24
  • BusBuddy
  • Update333
  • thehunt2024
  • coach24

How To Redeem Emergency Hamburg Codes

Unlike other Roblox games, redeeming codes in Emergency Hamburg is a bit different as it has been incorporated into the game’s phone system. Here are the steps:

  1. Boot up Emergency Hamburg in Roblox
  2. Press and hold C (or TAB) on your keyboard to access the phone
  3. Click on the Settings option on the left side of the screen
  4. Move to the Redeem Codes tab
  5. Enter the code in the text box that says Enter Codes
  6. Click on the redeem button to get your freebie

How To Get More Emergency Hamburg Codes

Emergency Hamburg codes can be found through several official channels, making it easier for players to boost their emergency response careers with free euros and special items. The most reliable sources include the official Emergency Hamburg Discord server, which you can join to participate in discussions, announcements, and exclusive giveaways where new codes are frequently shared. The developer regularly posts codes across their social media pages including their X and YouTube pages.

However, keeping track of all these sources can become overwhelming, especially since codes have no notification system to alert players when codes expire. Therefore, we recommend bookmarking this guide in your browser, as it is regularly updated with the latest Emergency Hamburg Codes and removes expired ones promptly to ensure you always have access to valid codes.
